channel.title: A few bugs
channel.description:
I need to know how to fix
#1 - bows disappear when I hit a npc/player #2 - scimyms disappear when I hit a Npc/player #3 - If there is a number of items on the ground say (20 sharks) and I pick one up, the whole 20 disappear when there should be 19 left.. #4 - How to modify max hits for Npc's and players, eg, I only hit around 18 max with a whip at 117 str. #5 - How to make a schedule, Like when I use a pot, take 1 pt off every 45 secs.
I beg someone to help me pls.. I really need this ty.

item.title: A few bugs
item.dc:creator: @Paintball199 Paintball199
item.description:
@Paintball199 wrote:

Nr 1 :
Making emotes for it.
Nr 2 :
Making Emotes for it.
Nr 3 :
Dunno.
Nr 4 :
Make a Case for it.
Nr 5 :
Make a Timer. When it Reaches a Certain Number it needs to Delete an Item. When it Reached Make it goes back to 0.

Read full topic

item.title: A few bugs
item.dc:creator: @dimebagx dimebagx
item.description:
@dimebagx wrote:

I need to know how to fix

#1 - bows disappear when I hit a npc/player
#2 - scimyms disappear when I hit a Npc/player
#3 - If there is a number of items on the ground say (20 sharks) and I pick one up, the whole 20
disappear when there should be 19 left…
#4 - How to modify max hits for Npc’s and players, eg, I only hit around 18 max with a whip at 117 str.
#5 - How to make a schedule, Like when I use a pot, take 1 pt off every 45 secs.

I beg someone to help me pls… I really need this ty.

Read full topic
